Migrating from Posterous to Jekyll

Posterous is closing down, and I'm moving to a simpler service.

After several years of happily using posterous and it's easy email-to-blog service, I've been forced to seek alternatives as posterous will turn off later next month. This post is my first attempt to blog using Jekyll, a rather straightforward way to communicate on the web. Read More
